about_the_game:
It’s 2040.



You are an intern at a prominent company that specializes in brain pattern technology and VR.
Digital Horizons.
Today is the big day! Digital Horizon’s tech has allowed people across the globe transfer their senses into the digital world.
Sight, smell, hearing, touch, taste…
Today, history will be made. Your brain patterns will be inserted directly into a test server.



No hardware required. No buffers. No body.
Today is just a four-day test… In and out!

You hate tests.



That didn’t happen though.
You ended up in the world wide web.
More specific, you ended up in the Twatch Servers, where the streamers stream to the world.



A person’s perspective can change the world directly. Even self-image can drastically change your appearance.
And somehow, they overlap effortlessly in a storm of chaos.

Now that you are here. What will you do?


Demo Version:
Core Systems with the exception of the PDA, and the planned minigames in place.
A slice of the main game.

Story covers the prologue of the Main Game and an added introduction to the Waifu Route of Asterella Star.

highlighted.name: No One Expects the Second Swallow
I REALLY want a cup of Coffee...
Jujitsu Training did NOT Pay off...

content_descriptors.notes:
Some themes talked about are mature in nature, such as sexual jokes. 

Others include: 
Being tied up against your will. 
Sucked into a chair. 

Demo includes two Hentai Sex Scenes.
Both Scenes have interactive animation control with voice, effects, and suggestive music. 
Both Scenes are consensual. 

Female Route: 
Girl on Girl Scene including masturbation, cunnilingus, and climaxing. 

Male Route: 
Male player on female demon.  Cowgirl Pose with full insertion and climax.

detailed_description:
Help Improve our Game!

Our Discord is 18+


Voice Act one of the NPC's with Credits.
Beta Testing Sections of the game.
Game Design Suggestions

You can take an active part in development! How many games offer that?


Feature List

  • Male or Female Routes with Non-Binary options
  • Every Decision Matters
  • Fully Voiced
  • Collectable Fan Art Gallery (With Credits)
  • Fully narrated and Voice acted H Scene DLC
  • Modular VN Systems for easy Modding
  • Color Themes Player Controlled
  • Voice and Audio Player controlled
  • 2D and 3D Compatibility
  • Live 2D Animation With Lip Sync, Expressions, and Eye Tracking
  • Animated Backgrounds


Cast Wallpapers


About the Demo

It’s 2040.



You are an intern at a prominent company that specializes in brain pattern technology and VR.
Digital Horizons.
Today is the big day! Digital Horizon’s tech has allowed people across the globe transfer their senses into the digital world.
Sight, smell, hearing, touch, taste…
Today, history will be made. Your brain patterns will be inserted directly into a test server.



No hardware required. No buffers. No body.
Today is just a four-day test… In and out!

You hate tests.



That didn’t happen though.
You ended up in the world wide web.
More specific, you ended up in the Twatch Servers, where the streamers stream to the world.



A person’s perspective can change the world directly. Even self-image can drastically change your appearance.
And somehow, they overlap effortlessly in a storm of chaos.

Now that you are here. What will you do?


Demo Version:
Core Systems with the exception of the PDA, and the planned minigames in place.
A slice of the main game.

Story covers the prologue of the Main Game and an added introduction to the Waifu Route of Asterella Star.
legal_notice:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or later
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3470 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7+
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7+
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: B1NARY Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 or DirectX 9.0c compatible GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3470 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A Vertical Slice covering the Prologue of B1NARY. It also includes an example of how the dating routes go with additional H Scenes that would be a DLC for the main game.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
